name: Adobe Lightroom Toolkit
summary: Learn about .LRTOOLKIT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: In Mac OS X, LRTOOLKIT files are located in the /​Applications/​Adobe Lightroom [version] Beta.app/​Contents/​Frameworks/​.
Photoshop Lightroom toolkits commonly appear with the .AGTOOLKIT extension.
NOTE: Lightroom was formerly known as Photoshop Lightroom.

description: File used by Adobe Lightroom, a digital photo organizing and editing application; stores data for tools, such as the camera raw toolkit, in the application's interface.
